entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 1:56PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snow and Blowing Snow Saturday... Another weather system is expected to move over the west coast of Alaska on Saturday. This will bring another round of snow and blowing snow to the region. Stay tuned to weather.gov/fairbanks for the latest updates.
